S

Sample - Class in data
The Sample class represents an image sample of the BDshape image set.
Sample(List<Float>) - Constructor for class data.Sample
Constructs a Sample with the specified features while associating it the default label: 0.
Sample(List<Float>, int) - Constructor for class data.Sample
Constructs a Sample with the specified features and label number.
samples - Variable in class classifiers.KMeansClassifier.Cluster
List of the samples contained in the cluster.
score(List<Sample>, List<Sample>) - Method in class classifiers.KNNClassifier
Computes the F1-score of the classifier on a test set.
setCentroid(KMeansClassifier.Centroid) - Method in class classifiers.KMeansClassifier.Cluster
Sets the centroid of the cluster.
setFeatures(List<Float>) - Method in class data.Sample
Sets the list of features for this sample.
setLabel(int) - Method in class data.Sample
Sets the label associated with this sample.
splitData(List<Sample>, float) - Static method in class classifiers.ClassifierUtilities
Splits a dataset into shuffled training and test sets based on the given ratio.
